body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Kevin Jones. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Patricia Hayes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Patricia. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I ordered a car from your dealership, and I'm relieved that it's finally on its way.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's great news to hear, Patricia. To help me further assist you, could you provide me with your order number and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my order number is five eight two one four and my phone number is three one zero five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Patricia. Your order is indeed in transit. Is there anything else you would like to inquire about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that was all. Thank you for your prompt assistance, Kevin.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Patricia. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Thank you for choosing Car Dealership. Have a great day!
